# Code Block Test

```python
def function_one():
    x = 1
    y = 2
    z = 3
    return x + y + z

def function_two():
    a = 10
    b = 20
    c = 30
    return a + b + c

def function_three():
    p = 100
    q = 200
    r = 300
    return p + q + r

def function_four():
    i = 1000
    j = 2000
    k = 3000
    return i + j + k
```
